00048 /* FUNCTION  free_cfgframe_object():                            */
00049 /* It frees memory allocated to cfg objects.                    */
00050 /* ------------------------------------------------------------ */
00051 
00052 void free_cfgframe_object(struct cfg_frame *cfg) { 
00053 
00054         int num_pmu,j = 0,i = 0;
00055         int phn,ann,dgn;
00056         struct dgnames *t_dgnames,*r_dgnames; 
00057         printf("Inside free_cfgframe_object()\n");
00058 
00059         while(j<cfg->num_pmu) {                                                 
00060 
00061                 if(cfg->pmu[j]->phnmr != 0)
00062                 free_2darray(cfg->pmu[j]->cnext->phnames,cfg->pmu[j]->phnmr);
00063                 if(cfg->pmu[j]->annmr != 0)
00064                 free_2darray(cfg->pmu[j]->cnext->angnames,cfg->pmu[j]->annmr);
00065 
00066                 if(cfg->pmu[j]->dgnmr != 0) {
00067 
00068                         t_dgnames = cfg->pmu[j]->cnext->first;
00069                         while(t_dgnames != NULL) {
00070 
00071                                 r_dgnames = t_dgnames->dg_next;
00072                                 free_2darray(t_dgnames->dgn,16);
00073                                 t_dgnames = r_dgnames;
00074                                 
00075                         }
00076                 }
00077 
00078 //              free_2darray_l(cfg->pmu[j]->phunit,cfg->pmu[j]->phnmr);
00079 //              free_2darray_l(cfg->pmu[j]->anunit,cfg->pmu[j]->annmr);
00080                 if(cfg->pmu[j]->dgnmr != 0) 
00081                         free_2darray(cfg->pmu[j]->dgunit,cfg->pmu[j]->dgnmr);
00082                 
00083 
00084                 j++;
00085         } // End of While 
00086 
00087         free(cfg);                      
00088 
00089 }

00091 /* -------------------------------------------------------------*/
00092 /* FUNCTION  free_2darray:                                      */
00093 /* It frees memory allocated to 2D Arrays.                      */
00094 /* -------------------------------------------------------------*/
00095 
00096 void free_2darray_l(long int **array, int x){ 
00097   
00098 int i;
00099  for(i=0; i<x; i++)
00100     free(array[i]);
00101  free(array);
00102 } 
00103

00107 /* -------------------------------------------------------------*/

00109 void free_2darray(unsigned char **array, int x){ 
00110   
00111 int i;
00112  for(i=0; i<x; i++)
00113     free(array[i]);
00114  free(array);
00115 }
